channel.title: Ancients when staff equipted and removeing magic tab?
channel.description: I looked for a TuT iv used it b4 lol but i just couldent find it :confused: so b4 i got to bed lol i would like to kno how to make it so u can only get ancients if u got the staff and how to remove the side tab with the spells on PLZ :D

item.title: Ancients when staff equipted and removeing magic tab?
item.dc:creator: @soalreaver soalreaver
item.description:
@soalreaver wrote:

oh well what u posted isent there i found this instead

[code] outStream.createFrame(107); // resets something in the client

	setSidebarInterface(1, 3917);
	setSidebarInterface(2, 638);
	setSidebarInterface(3, 3213);
	setSidebarInterface(4, 1644);
	setSidebarInterface(5, 5608);
            if(ancients == 0)
            {
	setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
            }
            if(ancients == 1)
            {
	setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
            }
	setSidebarInterface(7, 1);		// what is this?
	setSidebarInterface(8, 5065);
	setSidebarInterface(9, 5715);
	setSidebarInterface(10, 2449);
	setSidebarInterface(11, 4445);
	setSidebarInterface(12, 147);
	setSidebarInterface(13, 962);
	setSidebarInterface(0, 2423);[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Ancients when staff equipted and removeing magic tab?
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

search for

boolean proc

add this under that

if((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675)){ setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (normal = 1151); } [br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2007, 07:24:22 PM[/size][hr]and to remove the tab nxt to frends list search

setSidebarInterface(7, 12855);		// what is this?

you should see

setSidebarInterface(1, 3917);
		setSidebarInterface(2, 638);
		setSidebarInterface(3, 3213);
		setSidebarInterface(4, 1644);
		setSidebarInterface(5, 5608);
                if(ancients == 0)
                {
		setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
		setSidebarInterface(7, 12855);
                }
                if(ancients == 1)
                {
		setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
		setSidebarInterface(7, 1151);
                }
		setSidebarInterface(7, 12855);		// what is this?
		setSidebarInterface(8, 5065);
		setSidebarInterface(9, 5715); 
		setSidebarInterface(10, 2449);
		setSidebarInterface(11, 904);
		setSidebarInterface(12, 147);
		setSidebarInterface(13, 962);
		setSidebarInterface(0, 2423);

change it to

setSidebarInterface(1, 3917);
		setSidebarInterface(2, 638);
		setSidebarInterface(3, 3213);
		setSidebarInterface(4, 1644);
		setSidebarInterface(5, 5608);
                if(ancients == 0)
                {
		setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
		setSidebarInterface(7, 1);
                }
                if(ancients == 1)
                {
		setSidebarInterface(6, 1);
		setSidebarInterface(7, 1);
                }
		setSidebarInterface(7, 1);		// what is this?
		setSidebarInterface(8, 5065);
		setSidebarInterface(9, 5715); 
		setSidebarInterface(10, 2449);
		setSidebarInterface(11, 904);
		setSidebarInterface(12, 147);
		setSidebarInterface(13, 962);
		setSidebarInterface(0, 2423);

Read full topic
